title: Idea: Popular Streamers Match at All-Stars this year?
body:
This is just an idea i thought of while watching some stream highlights of people.

Well since i"m not able to see which popular streamers are better why not have they in a team together versusing this each other.

replies.body: Too bad there is no All-Stars this year. :(
